name: Nun Shall Survive
description:
Nun Shall Survive

A Game by Tracy McGrath

Made for Gunner Parade '22

https://itch.io/jam/gunner-parade-22

Leave running for tutorial

Controls:

O button to shoot (z on keyboard)

X  button to bomb (x on keyboard)

Update 2022-06-16: Fixed a bug that let you score after dying, this resets high scores for all users. Sorry for the inconvenience
